arts.ttl: Brazilian Interest in Danilo: Juventus captain linked with Vasco da Gama move
arts.sum: Recent reports from Brazil suggest that Juventus captain Danilo could be on the verge of a surprising move back to his homeland. Il Bianconero report how Vasco da Gama, one of Brazil’s most storied clubs, has reportedly made initial inquiries about the possibility of bringing the experienced defender to Rio de Janeiro. According to Brazilian media outlets, Vasco da Gama is already planning to strengthen their squad for the upcoming season, with Danilo emerging as a high-profile target. The 32-year-old’s contract with Juventus is set to expire in June 2025, which has opened the door for speculation about his future. The post Brazilian Interest in Danilo: Juventus captain linked with Vasco da Gama move appeared first on FootItalia.com.
